title: TagObject​
content: </> Atlas.TagObject( Object: Instance ,-- The object to tag. Tag: string-- The tag to assign to the object. ) → () Tags an object with a specific tag.

title: LoadLibrary​
content: </> Atlas:LoadLibrary(ModuleName: string) → any? Loads a library module by its name. @param ModuleName string -- The name of the module to load. @return any? -- Returns the loaded module or nil if not found.

title: GetObject​
content: </> Atlas:GetObject( ObjectName: string,-- The name of the object to retrieve. Timeout: number?-- The optional timeout duration. ) → Instance? -- Returns the object if found, or nil if not. Retrieves an object by name with an optional timeout.

title: New​
content: </> Atlas:New( ClassName: string-- The class name of the instance to create. ) → Instance? -- Returns the newly created instance, or nil if the class name is invalid. Creates a new instance of a specified class.

title: BindToTag​
content: </> Atlas:BindToTag( Tag: string,-- The tag to bind the callback to. Callback: function-- The callback function to execute when an object with the tag is found. ) → RBXScriptConnection -- The connection to the event, which can be disconnected if needed. Binds a callback function to a tag. The callback is invoked for all existing objects with the tag and whenever a new object is tagged.

title: GetObjects​
content: </> Atlas:GetObjects( Tag: string-- The tag to search for. ) → {Instance }-- Returns a table of all objects found with the tag. Retrieves all objects with a specific tag.

title: ApplySettings​
content: </> Atlas:ApplySettings( Object: Instance ,-- The object to apply the settings to. Settings: {[string]: any}-- A table of settings to apply. ) → () Applies a set of settings to an object.

title: GenerateUniqueId​
content: </> Atlas:GenerateUniqueId() → string-- Returns a unique ID string. Generates a unique ID using a GUID.

title: LogOperation​
content: </> Atlas:LogOperation( Operation: string,-- The operation to log. Details: {[string]: any}?-- Optional details about the operation. ) → () Logs an operation with optional details.

title: DeepClone​
content: </> Atlas:DeepClone( Object: Instance -- The object to clone. ) → Instance -- Returns the cloned object. Deep clones an object and tags all its descendants.

title: TagObject​
content: </> Atlas:TagObject( Object: Instance ,-- The object to tag. Tag: string-- The tag to assign. ) → () Tags an object with a specific tag.

title: RemoveTag​
content: </> Atlas:RemoveTag( Object: Instance ,-- The object to tag. Tag: string-- The tag to assign. ) → () Removes an object with a specific tag.

title: GetObjectWithTag​
content: </> Atlas:GetObjectWithTag( Tag: string-- The tag to search for. ) → {Instance }-- Returns a table of all objects found with the tag. Retrieves all objects with a specific tag.
